Sentencas: In this study, the effect of perovskite (Ca,Co)-doped LaCrO3 (LCCC) coating on a commercial ferritic stainless steel (SS430) as metallic interconnector in intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cell has been investigated in terms of oxidation kinetics and area specific resistance (ASR) at 800 A degrees C in air environment.
Titulo: Improvements in oxidation resistance and conductivity of Fe-Cr metallic interconnector by (La0.8Ca0.2)(Cr0.9Co0.1)O3 coating

Sentencas: The LCCC coating was deposited on SS430 by atmospheric plasma spraying from a spray-dried (La0.8Ca0.2)(Cr0.9Co0.1)O-3 powder of 10-30 um.
Titulo: Improvements in oxidation resistance and conductivity of Fe-Cr metallic interconnector by (La0.8Ca0.2)(Cr0.9Co0.1)O3 coating

Sentencas: The plasma-sprayed LCCC coating had a low porosity of similar to 1.0 area% and a good electrical conductivity of 33 S/cm at 800 A degrees C.
Titulo: Improvements in oxidation resistance and conductivity of Fe-Cr metallic interconnector by (La0.8Ca0.2)(Cr0.9Co0.1)O3 coating

Sentencas: The protective LCCC coating significantly lowered the growth rate of thermally grown oxide scale of SS430 by inhibiting oxygen inward diffusion.
Titulo: Improvements in oxidation resistance and conductivity of Fe-Cr metallic interconnector by (La0.8Ca0.2)(Cr0.9Co0.1)O3 coating

Sentencas: The oxidation of the LCCC coated SS430 for 1200 h led to the formation of duplex Cr2O3-LaCrO3 scale layer of similar to 1 um in thickness.
Titulo: Improvements in oxidation resistance and conductivity of Fe-Cr metallic interconnector by (La0.8Ca0.2)(Cr0.9Co0.1)O3 coating

Sentencas: A high conductive LaCrO3 phase in the oxide scale was formed by the chemical interactions between the Cr2O3 scale and the LCCC coating.
Titulo: Improvements in oxidation resistance and conductivity of Fe-Cr metallic interconnector by (La0.8Ca0.2)(Cr0.9Co0.1)O3 coating

Sentencas: The ASR for the LCCC coated sample was limited to 9.2 m Omega A center dot cm(2) after oxidation for 1200 h at 800 A degrees C, which was much lower than ASR for the uncoated sample.
Titulo: Improvements in oxidation resistance and conductivity of Fe-Cr metallic interconnector by (La0.8Ca0.2)(Cr0.9Co0.1)O3 coating
